column4: Hey all, I've installed ubuntu and now I'm trying to get my wireless to work.  The card is supported, the ralink driver is present and can see the various networks in my area, however they all have 0/100 quality and won't connect to any of them.  I know it's not my router beccause I'm using the connection on XP right now, I've been going through the docs and can't seem to see a problem... is...
